quotes.quote: First, I believe that this nation should commit itself to achieving the goal, before this decade is out, of landing a man on the moon and returning him safely to the earth.
quotes.source: Neil Armstrong as the Lunar Module undocked from 'Columbia'
quotes.quote: Tranquility Base here.  The Eagle has landed
quotes.source: Neil Armstrong after the LEM had landed on the moon
'Buzz' Aldrin's description of the lunar surface
